generatePosition

public static int[] generatePosition(int length,
                                     int colSize,
                                     int rowSize,
                                     Algorithms.Direction dir)
returns a valid start point for a word by length. Does not check intersections.

Parameters:
length - - length of the word.
colSize - - number of columns.
rowSize - - number of rows.
Returns:
int[] - [0] is the x value, and [1] is the y value.

Returns:
